Daring Escape.name: Daring Escape
Daring Escape.flavor: You transfer the momentum of a killing blow into a rapid dash that leaves remaining enemies far behind.
Daring Escape.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points.
Daring Escape.effect: You shift up to twice your speed. During the shift, you can climb and jump, with a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks to do so.
